alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Lorain; Mahoning; Medina; Portage; Stark; Summit; Trumbull; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 10:08AM EST until January 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches bringing total accumulations to 7 to 14 inches. The highest amounts will be east of I-77. Northwest winds gusting as high as 30 mph will lead to blowing and drifting of snow. * WHERE...Lorain, Medina, Summit, Portage, Trumbull, Wayne, Stark, Mahoning, and Holmes counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will taper off from west to east through the morning. Lake effect snow showers increase through the afternoon into the evening. Blowing and drifting snow will continue to produce significant impacts.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Holmes; Lorain; Mahoning; Medina; Portage; Stark; Summit; Trumbull; Wayne
